content.rendered:
Hospitality beyond expectations

About Hotel Ans International

Located in the heart of the city of Raigarh, at Jagatpur, Dhimrapur Road, Hotel Ans  International is a 3 Star hotel hosting 71 comfortable rooms that are spacious, luxurious, and modern. We have all you need to experience a relaxing stay, celebrate moments that matter, and discover flavours that you will love.

Rooms

Book Now

Events and Celebrations

Know more

Restaurants and Bar

EXPLORE more

Experience Luxury
Experience Comfort

An unforgettable experience awaits you at Hotel Ans International. Recharge in luxurious rooms, eat delicious food at our remarkable restaurants and bar, and celebrate special moments in our wonderful banquet halls. 

Organise Corporate Events

One of the perfect venues in which to hold offsites, corporate meetings, events, and team-building activities, we offer a seamless experience with all essential amenities for your corporate events. We ensure that an event of any type can be flawlessly executed, leaving company leaders able to focus on their teams, versus having to be involved in the minutest of planning.

Contact us

We Love To Serve Our Customers

I was visiting Raipur for the first time for a business trip, and I was confused about where to stay. That’s when I came across Hotel Ans. I have to say, I had a great stay with them.
Rohit Khanna
I’m from Raipur and I love visiting hotels ans regularly for dinners or even going with friends to the bar. Their service exceeds one’s expectations.
Anjali Mathur
Very accommodating staff. Timely check-in and amazing food. The amenities are great too. We went here for a staycation!
Ajay Awasthi
I celebrated my child’s 1st birthday here. The staff ensured that all the requirements were met. Everyone enjoyed the event. Very happy and will recommend this hotel to everyone for hosting events.
Parineeta Gupta
